subject: Horse Racing
Casinos
Gambling
lead_paragraph: The horse-race handicappers still tend to crowd the track and its less-than-glamorous environs, while the casino lovers flock to the glowing monitors and electronic table games.
snippet: The horse-race handicappers still tend to crowd the track and its less-than-glamorous environs, while the casino lovers flock to the glowing monitors and electronic table games.
